title: Do Republicans (Conservatives) have a future?
selftext:
Legitimate Question. (Personally i find this very interesting, seeing as the youth becomes increasingly left leaning, education is more widely available (higher education leads to left leaning views, also no offense guys but some of our stances just have no logic, empathy, or factual basis)

If possible I'd like for some discussion/opinions in the comments. This topics super interesting in my opinion.

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/hgl94b)
